mapper.select: select rcservice.PK_ID, rcservice.NAME, rcservice.DESCRIBE, rcservice.TYPE, rcservice.APP_ID, rcservice.DEL_FLG, rcservice.CRT_USER, rcservice.CRT_TIME, rcservice.UPT_USER, rcservice.UPT_TIME, case when SERVICE_STATIS.failed_count is null then 0 else SERVICE_STATIS.failed_count end as failed_count, case when SERVICE_STATIS.success_count is null then 0 else SERVICE_STATIS.success_count end as success_count from RC_SERVICE rcservice left join (select case when mcselect1.SERVICE_NAME is null then mcselect2.SERVICE_NAME else mcselect1.SERVICE_NAME end as service_name, mcselect1.failed_count, mcselect2.success_count from (select distinct mclog.SERVICE_NAME, count(mclog.status) as failed_count from MC_CONSUME_LOG mclog where mclog.status = '1' group by mclog.SERVICE_NAME, mclog.STATUS) mcselect1 full join (select distinct SERVICE_NAME, count(status) as success_count from MC_CONSUME_LOG mclog where mclog.status = '0' group by SERVICE_NAME, STATUS) mcselect2 on mcselect2.SERVICE_NAME = mcselect1.SERVICE_NAME) SERVICE_STATIS ON rcservice.Name = SERVICE_STATIS.SERVICE_NAME where rcservice.DEL_FLG = '0' AND rcservice.TYPE = #{type} AND rcservice.NAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%' AND rcservice.DESCRIBE LIKE '%' || #{describe} || '%' order by success_count desc;
